ðŸ“– Summary: Keep-Alive is a lightweight, cross-platform utility designed to prevent systems from going to sleep. It supports macOS, Windows, and Linux, offering configurable keep-alive durations and a simple, intuitive interface. The tool is ideal for maintaining active connections, ensuring uninterrupted downloads, and supporting long-running tasks.
